summary: This is an email from the DOJ's voip system forwarding a voice message attachment to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address. The message was sent on August 16, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
keyFacts: A voice message was forwarded to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address on August 16, 2019.
The message originated from the DOJ's voip system, indicating it may have been a call to a Department of Justice line.
The timing (August 16, 2019) is significant as it was shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The sender's name is listed as 'unavailable', and the attachment is a .wav audio file.
This document shows official communication channels being used to forward potential victim or witness communications to the appropriate office.
